menu_item_watch_tooltip: Watch top matches across each division.
menu_item_collection_tooltip: View your cards or build a deck.
menu_item_codex_tooltip: Explore the lore and world of Duelyst.
premium_currency_indicator_tooltip: Buy anything in the Shop with Diamonds.
play_mode_practice_description: Hone your skills against computer controlled opponents.
play_mode_ranked_description: Rank up each month to earn prizes at the end of the season!
play_mode_gauntlet_description: Compete in Draft Mode. The longer you last, the better the rewards!
play_mode_rift_description: Compete with cross-faction decks you can upgrade and evolve!
play_mode_festive_description: A special game mode for the Frostfire Festival!
deck_select_empty_instructions: To create a custom deck, head over to your "Collection" on the main menu.
